title: "AI or DBT can improve surveillance after breast-conserving therapy"
excerpt: "Mammographic surveillance after breast-conserving therapy can be improved by digital breast tomosynthesis (DBT), or in particular, by artificial intelligence (AI), according to research posted August 11 in the American Journal of Roentgenology."
